How It Works

Set up your AI assistant in a few simple steps. No code, no complexity.

1

Connect Your Channels

Link your social accounts & CRM in seconds.

2

Train Your AI

Teach it using your website, PDFs, or FAQs.

3

Automate Engagement

Let AI handle queries, send links & book appointments.

4

Track & Optimize

Get insights, analytics & campaign feedback.
